Keywords: Avengers , Codex , Fantastic Four , Intelligencia , Soldier
Real Name: Thaddeus Ross
Special Powers
CIRCLE OF FOUR: If Red Hulk hasn't been moved or placed this turn, modify attack and damage +1.
ANGRIER AND HOTTER: When Red Hulk takes damage from an opponent's attack, give him an Anger token (maximum 2). // When Red Hulk makes a close attack and has an Anger token, modify damage +1 and after resolutions, remove an Anger token. // If Red Hulk has 2 Anger tokens, he deals penetrating damage (including with Poison).

Goop
Swinging for 12atk/5dmg is nasty. Unfortunately the Anger token thing is mostly useless. If he's hit twice he's likely already dead. He seems like you will get one big swing and then be dead weight with no move and attack after his top click. There are many other cheaper pieces that do that for a much lower cost than 75.
